Description: EXCEPTIONAL CONDITION, GREAT PLAYER! KOREAN QUALITY! NOT made in Indonesia or China. This is an EPIPHONE by GIBSON Les Paul (Standard) flame maple top electric guitar. Serial number U000312xx. Made in Korea, MIK in the Unsang plant, March of 2000. It comes with the gig bag case you see in the pictures. 100% complete. The top and back of the guitar are in near mint condition, with extremely light scratches and some polish swirl. The back of the neck is perfectly SMOOTH! The frets and finger board look NEAR NEW! Looks like it has barely been played. First class guitar, not stamped 'used' or '2nd' like so many here on ebay. Features include... chrome hardware, vintage Kluson style tuners, 22 fret neck with rosewood fingerboard and pearly markers, two original humbucker pickups, three way PU selector switch, tun-o-matic bridge, stop tailpiece, bound transparent red body, single ply pick guard, mahogany body, arched flamed maple top. Professionally set up. Everything works as it should... electronics, truss rod, bridge, tuners, etc. The controls are clean and not scratchy. There was a slight crackle in the tone controls I could not work out, so they have been replaced. This guitar came to me without a pickguard, so I added one. I have serviced the guitar... cleaned and polished the neck and body, cleaned and conditioned the fingerboard, cleaned and polished the frets, installed new strings (Ernie Ball regular slinky 10-46's), adjusted bridge/truss rod/ intonation, etc. She is ready to play and PLAYS GREAT!! Buyer pays $34.95 shipping, insurance, packaging and handling to lower 48 states. Items over 2 lbs will ship Fed Ex ground, (no PO Boxes). Thanks for looking and good luck. Please take a look at my other listings and the last picture I have a great collection of inexpensive, but professional grade guitars listed for sale... a Mexican MIM made in Mexico Fender Stratocaster strat in Oly Olympic white with maple neck, a Korean NEAR MINT EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD FLAME TOP TRANS CHERRY LIMITED EDITION electric guitar with gig bag case, a made in Korea Epi Korina Flying V 1958 reissue, a near mint SG G-400 LIMITED EDITION CUSTOM SHOP 1966 REISSUE with original hard shell case, a NEAR MINT EPIPHONE LES PAUL STANDARD in Cardinal Red and an exceptional transparent cherry red Ibanez AS73 TCR-12-01 semi hollow es 335 style electric guitar. Often requiring reassembly, tuning and/or adjusting. -If you receive an item that has been damaged in shipping, CONTACT ME IMMEDIATELY and save all the packaging. We will work through the claim together until things are right. -I can ship almost anywhere, but free shipping or a fixed shipping price is for the contiguous 48 states ONLY. If you have a foreign address, use an APO, live in Alaska, Puerto Rico, etc., message me for a shipping price BEFORE you buy. Due to the cost and risk of shipping I do not accept returns from outside the US. Once the package is delivered to the carrier, the foreign buyer is responsible for the item, including but not limited to taxes, fees, customs issues, delays, damage, lose, duty, etc.
